When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.

When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.

probability.title: Probability

trust_event.description: Event to run when this entity becomes trusting
trust_event.title: Trust Event

trust_items.title: Trust Items
trust_items.description: The list of items that can be used to get the entity to trust players

CFF.title: Type Family
CFF.description: Defines the families this entity belongs to.

items.description: Family name

CFH.title: Variant
CFH.description: Used to differentiate the component group of a variant of an entity from others (e.g. ocelot, villager) Parameters

value.description: The ID of the variant. By convention, 0 is the ID of the base entity
value.title: Value

CFI.title: Walk Animation Speed
CFI.description: Sets the speed multiplier for this entity's walk animation speed.

value.description: The higher the number, the faster the animation for walking plays. A value of 1.0 means normal speed, while 2.0 means twice as fast
value.title: Value

CFJ.description: Sets that this entity wants to become a jockey.
CFJ.title: Wants Jockey

CGA.description: Defines the speed with which an entity can move through water.
CGA.title: Water Movement

drag_factor.description: Drag factor to determine movement speed when in water.
drag_factor.title: Drag Factor

CGC.title: Priority
CGC.description: How important this behavior is. Lower priority behaviors will be executed first.

CGB.title: Admire Item
CGB.description: Enables the mob to admire items that have been configured as admirable. Must be used in combination with the admire_item component.

admire_item_sound.description: The sound event to play when admiring the item
admire_item_sound.title: Admire Item Sound

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.
sound_interval.title: Sound Interval

CGD.title: Avoid Block
CGD.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain blocks.

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: Maximum distance to look for a block in xz.

search_height.title: Search Height
search_height.description: Maximum distance to look for a block in y.

sprint_speed_modifier.title: Sprint Speed Modifier
sprint_speed_modifier.description: Modifier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

target_blocks.title: Target Blocks
target_blocks.description: List of block types this mob avoids.

avoid_block_sound.title: Avoid Block Sound
avoid_block_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding a block.

walk_speed_modifier.title: Walk Speed Modifier
walk_speed_modifier.description: Modifier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.
sound_interval.title: Sound Interval

max_dist.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice
max_dist.title: Maximum Dist

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged
walk_speed_multiplier.title: Walk Speed Multiplier

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged
sprint_speed_multiplier.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier

must_see.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice
must_see.title: Must See

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more
must_see_forget_duration.title: Must See Forget Duration

CGE.title: Avoid Mob Type
CGE.description: Allows the entity to run away from other entities that meet the criteria specified.

avoid_mob_sound.title: Avoid Mob Sound
avoid_mob_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding another mob.

avoid_target_xz.title: Avoid Target XZ
avoid_target_xz.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this XZ Distance.

avoid_target_y.title: Avoid Target Y
avoid_target_y.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this Y Distance.

ignore_visibilty.title: Ignore Visibilty
ignore_visibilty.description: Whether or not to ignore direct line of sight while this entity is running away from other specified entities.

max_dist.title: Max Dist
max_dist.description: Maximum distance to look for an avoid target for the entity.

max_flee.title: Max Flee
max_flee.description: How many blocks away from its avoid target the entity must be for it to stop fleeing from the avoid target.

probability_per_strength.title: Probability Per Strength
probability_per_strength.description: Percent chance this entity will stop avoiding another entity based on that entity's strength, where 1.0 = 100%.

remove_target.title: Remove Target
remove_target.description: Determine if we should remove target when fleeing or not.

sprint_distance.title: Sprint Distance
sprint_distance.description: How many blocks within range of its avoid target the entity must be for it to begin sprinting away from the avoid target.

sprint_speed_multiplier.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

walk_speed_multiplier.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.

work_in_rain_tolerance.title: Work In Rain Tolerance
work_in_rain_tolerance.description: If "can_work_in_rain" is false, this is the maximum number of ticks left in the goal where rain will not interrupt the goal

ignore_visibility.description: If true, visbility between this entity and the mob type will not be checked.
ignore_visibility.title: Ignore Visibility

entity_types.title: Entity Types
entity_types.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to avoid.

on_escape_event.title: On Escape Event
on_escape_event.description: Event that is triggered when escaping from a mob.

sound_interval.title: Sound Interval
sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

CGG.title: Barter
CGG.description: Enables the mob to barter for items that have been configured as barter currency. Must be used in combination with the barter component

CGH.title: Beg
CGH.description: Allows this mob to look at and follow the player that holds food they like.

items.description: List of items that this mob likes
List of items that this mob likes
items.title: Properties
Properties

look_distance.description: Distance in blocks the mob will beg from
look_distance.title: Look Distance

look_time.description: The range of time in seconds this mob will stare at the player holding a food they like, begging for it
look_time.title: Look Time

CGJ.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.
CGJ.title: Speed Multiplier

CGI.title: Break Door
CGI.description: Allows this mob to break doors.

CHA.title: Breed
CHA.description: Allows this mob to breed with other mobs.

CHB.title: Celebrate Survive
CHB.description: Allows this entity to celebrate surviving a raid by shooting fireworks.

fireworks_interval.title: Fireworks Interval
fireworks_interval.description: Minimum and maximum time between firework (positive, in seconds).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration in seconds that the celebration lasts for.

on_celebration_end_event.title: On Celebration End Event
on_celebration_end_event.description: The event to trigger when the goal's duration expires.

CHC.title: Celebrate
CHC.description: Allows this entity to celebrate surviving a raid by making celebration sounds and jumping.

celebration_sound.description: The sound event to trigger during the celebration.
celebration_sound.title: Celebration Sound

duration.description: The duration in seconds that the celebration lasts for.
duration.title: Duration

jump_interval.description: Minimum and maximum time between jumping (positive, in seconds).
jump_interval.title: Jump Interval

on_celebration_end_event.description: The event to trigger when the goal's duration expires.
on_celebration_end_event.title: On Celebration End Event

sound_interval.description: Minimum and maximum time between sound events (positive, in seconds).
sound_interval.title: Sound Interval

CHD.title: Charge Attack
CHD.description: Allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack.

max_distance.title: Max Distance
max_distance.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is farther than this distance to the target.

min_distance.title: Min Distance
min_distance.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is closer than this distance to the target.

success_rate.title: Success Rate
success_rate.description: Percent chance this entity will start a charge attack, if not already attacking (1.0 = 100%)

CHE.title: Charge Held Item
CHE.description: Allows an entity to charge and use their held item.

items.title: Items
items.description: The list of items that can be used to charge the held item. This list is required and must have at least one item in it.
Items names to be used.
items.title: Item ID

CHF.title: Circle Around Anchor
CHF.description: Causes an entity to circle around an anchor point placed near a point or target.

radius_range.description: Horizontal distance from the anchor point this entity must stay within upon a successful radius adjustment.
radius_range.title: Radius Range

radius_change_chance.description: A random value to determine when to increase the size of the radius up to the maximum. This has a 1/value chance every tick to do so.
radius_change_chance.title: Radius Change Chance

height_above_target_range.description: The number of blocks above the target that the next anchor point can be set. This value is used only when the entity is tracking a target.
height_above_target_range.title: Height Above Target Range

height_offset_range.description: The range of height in blocks offset the mob can have from it's anchor point.
height_offset_range.title: Height Offset Range

height_change_chance.description: A random value to determine when to change the height of the mob from the anchor point. This has a 1/value chance every tick to do so.
height_change_chance.title: Height Change Chance

goal_radius.description: Maximum distance from the anchor-point in which this entity considers itself to have reached the anchor point. This is to prevent the entity from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot.
goal_radius.title: Goal Radius

radius_change.title: Radius Change
radius_change.description: The number of blocks to increase the current movement radius by, upon successful `radius_adjustment_chance`. If the current radius increases over the range maximum, the current radius will be set back to the range minimum and the entity will change between clockwise and counter-clockwise movement.

radius_adjustment_chance.title: Radius Adjustment Chance
radius_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase the size of the current movement radius around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. `radius_change_chance` is deprecated and has been replaced with `radius_adjustment_chance`.

height_adjustment_chance.title: Height Adjustment Chance
height_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase or decrease the current height around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. `height_change_chance` is deprecated and has been replaced with `height_adjustment_chance`.

angle_change.title: Angle Change
angle_change.description: Number of degrees to change this entity's facing by, when the entity selects its next anchor point.

CHG.title: Controlled By Player
CHG.description: Allows the entity to be controlled by the player using an item in the item_controllable property (required). Also requires the minecraft:movement property, and the minecraft:rideable property. On every tick, the entity will attempt to rotate towards where the player is facing with the control item whilst simultaneously moving forward.

fractional_rotation.title: Fractional Rotation
fractional_rotation.description: The entity will attempt to rotate to face where the player is facing each tick. The entity will target this percentage of their difference in their current facing angles each tick (from 0.0 to 1.0 where 1.0 = 100%). This is limited by FractionalRotationLimit. A value of 0.0 will result in the entity no longer turning to where the player is facing.

fractional_rotation_limit.title: Fractional Rotation Limit
fractional_rotation_limit.description: Limits the total degrees the entity can rotate to face where the player is facing on each tick.

mount_speed_multiplier.title: Mount Speed Multiplier
mount_speed_multiplier.description: Speed multiplier of mount when controlled by player.

CHH.title: Defend Trusted Target
CHH.description: Allows the mob to target another mob that hurts an entity it trusts.

aggro_sound.description: Sound to occasionally play while defending.
aggro_sound.title: Aggro Sound

must_see.description: If true, only entities in this mob's viewing range can be selected as targets
must_see.title: Must See

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more
must_see_forget_duration.title: Must See Forget Duration

within_radius.description: Distance in blocks that the target can be within to launch an attack
within_radius.title: Within Radius

entity_types.description: List of entity types that this mob considers valid targets
entity_types.title: Entity Types

CHI.title: Defend Village Target
CHI.description: Allows the entity to stay in a village and defend the village from aggressors. If a player is in bad standing with the village this goal will cause the entity to attack the player regardless of filter conditions.

entity_types.description: List of entity types this mob considers a threat to the village
entity_types.title: Entity Types

attack_chance.title: Attack Chance
attack_chance.description: The percentage chance that the entity has to attack aggressors of its village, where 1.0 = 100%.

CHJ.title: Delayed Attack
CHJ.description: Allows the mob to drink potions based on specified environment conditions.

attack_duration.title: Attack Duration
attack_duration.description: The entity's attack animation will play out over this duration (in seconds). Also controls attack cooldown.

attack_once.title: Attack Once
attack_once.description: Allows the entity to use this attack behavior, only once EVER.

attack_types.title: Attack Types
attack_types.description: Defines the entity types this entity will attack.

hit_delay_pct.title: Hit Delay Pct
hit_delay_pct.description: The percentage into the attack animation to apply the damage of the attack (1.0 = 100%).

inner_boundary_time_increase.title: Inner Boundary Time Increase
inner_boundary_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_inner_boundary".

max_path_time.title: Max Path Time
max_path_time.description: Maximum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

melee_fov.title: Melee Fov
melee_fov.description: Field of view (in degrees) when using the sensing component to detect an attack target.

min_path_time.title: Min Path Time
min_path_time.description: Minimum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

on_attack.title: On Attack
on_attack.description: Defines the event to trigger when this entity successfully attacks.

outer_boundary_time_increase.title: Outer Boundary Time Increase
outer_boundary_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_outer_boundary".

path_fail_time_increase.title: Path Fail Time Increase
path_fail_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when this entity cannot move along the current path.

path_inner_boundary.title: Path Inner Boundary
path_inner_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_tick_increase".

path_outer_boundary.title: Path Outer Boundary
path_outer_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_tick_increase".

random_stop_interval.title: Random Stop Interval
random_stop_interval.description: This entity will have a 1 in N chance to stop it's current attack, where N = "random_stop_interval".

reach_multiplier.title: Reach Multiplier
reach_multiplier.description: Used with the base size of the entity to determine minimum target-distance before trying to deal attack damage.

require_complete_path.title: Require Complete Path
require_complete_path.description: Toggles (on/off) the need to have a full path from the entity to the target when using this melee attack behavior.

set_persistent.title: Set Persistent
set_persistent.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

track_target.title: Track Target
track_target.description: Allows the entity to track the attack target, even if the entity has no sensing.

x_max_rotation.title: X Max Rotation
x_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

y_max_head_rotation.title: Y Max Head Rotation
y_max_head_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

CIA.title: Door Interact
CIA.description: Allows the mob to drink potions based on specified environment conditions.

CIB.title: Dragonchargeplayer
CIB.description: Allows this entity to attack a player by charging at them. The player is chosen by the "minecraft:behavior.dragonscanning". Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

active_speed.title: Active Speed
active_speed.description: The speed this entity moves when this behavior has started or while it's active.

continue_charge_threshold_time.title: Continue Charge Threshold Time
continue_charge_threshold_time.description: If the dragon is outside the "target_zone" for longer than "continue_charge_threshold_time" seconds, the charge is canceled.

flight_speed.title: Flight Speed
flight_speed.description: The speed this entity moves while this behavior is not active.

target_zone.title: Target Zone
target_zone.description: Minimum and maximum distance, from the target, this entity can use this behavior.

turn_speed.title: Turn Speed
turn_speed.description: The speed at which this entity turns while using this behavior.

CIC.title: Dragondeath
CIC.description: Allows the dragon to go out with glory. This controls the Ender Dragon's death animation and can't be used by other mobs.

CID.title: Dragonflaming
CID.description: Allows the dragon to use its flame breath attack. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time
cooldown_time.description: Time (in seconds), after roar, to breath flame.

flame_time.title: Flame Time
flame_time.description: Time (in seconds), after roar, to breath flame.

ground_flame_count.title: Ground Flame Count
ground_flame_count.description: Number of ground flame-breath attacks to use before flight-takeoff.

roar_time.title: Roar Time
roar_time.description: Time (in seconds) to roar, before breathing flame.

CIE.title: Dragonholdingpattern
CIE.description: Allows the Dragon to fly around in a circle around the center podium. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

CIF.title: Dragonlanding
CIF.description: Allows the Dragon to stop flying and transition into perching mode. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

CIG.title: Dragonscanning
CIG.description: Allows the dragon to look around for a player to attack while in perch mode. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

CIH.title: Dragonstrafeplayer
CIH.description: Allows this entity to fly around looking for a player to shoot fireballs at. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

active_speed.title: Active Speed
active_speed.description: The speed this entity moves when this behavior has started or while it's active.

fireball_range.title: Fireball Range
fireball_range.description: Maximum distance of this entity's fireball attack while strafing.

flight_speed.title: Flight Speed
flight_speed.description: The speed this entity moves while this behavior is not active.

switch_direction_probability.title: Switch Direction Probability
switch_direction_probability.description: Percent chance to to switch this entity's strafe direction between clockwise and counterclockwise. Switch direction chance occurs each time a new target is chosen (1.0 = 100%).

target_in_range_and_in_view_time.title: Target In Range And In View Time
target_in_range_and_in_view_time.description: Time (in seconds) the target must be in fireball range, and in view [ie, no solid terrain in-between the target and this entity], before a fireball can be shot.

target_zone.title: Target Zone
target_zone.description: Minimum and maximum distance, from the target, this entity can use this behavior.

turn_speed.title: Turn Speed
turn_speed.description: The speed at which this entity turns while using this behavior.

view_angle.title: View Angle
view_angle.description: The target must be within "view_angle" degrees of the dragon's current rotation before a fireball can be shot.

CII.title: Dragontakeoff
CII.description: Allows the dragon to leave perch mode and go back to flying around. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

CIJ.title: Beg
CIJ.description: Allows the mob to drink potions based on specified environment conditions.

speed_modifier.description: Movement speed modifier of the mob when using this AI Goal
speed_modifier.title: Speed Modifier

potions.description: A list of potions that this entity can drink.
potions.title: Potions

items.description: A potions that this entity can drink.
items.title: Potions

id.description: The registry ID of the potion to use
id.title: Id

chance.description: The percent chance (from 0.0 to 1.0) of this potion being selected when searching for a potion to use.
chance.title: Chance

filters.description: The filters to use when determining if this potion can be selected.

CJA.description: Allows the entity to move toward a target, and drop an item near the target. This goal requires a "minecraft:navigation" to execute.
CJA.title: Drop Item For

entity_types.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to drop an item for.
entity_types.title: Entity Types

cooldown.title: Cooldown
cooldown.description: Total time that the goal is on cooldown before it can be used again.

drop_item_chance.title: Drop Item Chance
drop_item_chance.description: The percent chance the entity will drop an item when using this goal.

goal_radius.title: Goal Radius
goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the entity considers it has reached it's target position.

loot_table.title: Loot Table
loot_table.description: The loot table that contains the possible loot the entity can drop with this goal.

max_head_look_at_height.title: Max Head Look At Height
max_head_look_at_height.description: The maximum height the entities head will look at when dropping the item. The entity will always be looking at its target.

minimum_teleport_distance.title: Minimum Teleport Distance
minimum_teleport_distance.description: If the target position is farther away than this distance on any tick, the entity will teleport to the target position.

offering_distance.title: Offering Distance
offering_distance.description: The preferred distance the entity tries to be from the target it is dropping an item for.

on_drop_attempt.title: On Drop Attempt
on_drop_attempt.description: The event to trigger when the entity attempts to drop an item.

search_count.title: Search Count
search_count.description: The number of blocks each tick that the entity will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

search_height.title: Search Height
search_height.description: The Height in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: The distance in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

seconds_before_pickup.title: Seconds Before Pickup
seconds_before_pickup.description: The numbers of seconds that will pass before the dropped entity can be picked up from the ground.

target_range.title: Target Range
target_range.description: The range in blocks within which the entity searches to find a target to drop an item for.

teleport_offset.title: Teleport Offset
teleport_offset.description: When the entity teleports, offset the teleport position by this many blocks in the X, Y, and Z coordinate.

time_of_day_range.title: Time Of Day Range
time_of_day_range.description: The valid times of day that this goal can be used. For reference: noon is 0.0, sunset is 0.25, midnight is 0.5, and sunrise is 0.75, and back to noon for 1.0.

CJB.title: Eat Block
CJB.description: Allows the entity to consume a block, replace the eaten block with another block, and trigger an event as a result.

on_eat.description: The event to trigger when the block eating animation has completed.
on_eat.title: On Eat

success_chance.title: Succes Chance
success_chance.description: A molang expression defining the success chance the entity has to consume a block.

time_until_eat.title: Time Until Eat
time_until_eat.description: The amount of time (in seconds) it takes for the block to be eaten upon a successful eat attempt.

eat_and_replace_block_pairs.title: Eat And Replace Block Pairs
eat_and_replace_block_pairs.description: A collection of pairs of blocks; the first ("eat_block")is the block the entity should eat, the second ("replace_block") is the block that should replace the eaten block.

items.title: Eat And Replace Block Pair
items.description: UNDOCUMENTED

CJC.title: Eat Carried Item
CJC.description: If the mob is carrying a food item, the mob will eat it and the effects will be applied to the mob.

delay_before_eating.description: Time in seconds the mob should wait before eating the item.
delay_before_eating.title: Delay Before Eating

CJD.title: Enderman Leave Block
CJD.description: Allows the enderman to drop a block they are carrying. Can only be used by Endermen.

CJE.title: Enderman Take Block
CJE.description: Allows the enderman to take a block and carry it around. Can only be used by Endermen.

CJF.title: Equip Item
CJF.description: The entity puts on the desired equipment.

CJG.title: Explore Outskirts
CJG.description: Allows the entity to first travel to a random point on the outskirts of the village, and then explore random points within a small distance. This goal requires "minecraft:dweller" and "minecraft:navigation" to execute.

dist_from_boundary.title: Dist From Boundary
dist_from_boundary.description: The distance from the boundary the villager must be within in to explore the outskirts.

explore_dist.title: Explore Dist
explore_dist.description: Total distance in blocks the the entity will explore beyond the village bounds when choosing its travel point.

max_travel_time.title: Max Travel Time
max_travel_time.description: This is the maximum amount of time an entity will attempt to reach it's travel point on the outskirts of the village before the goal exits.

max_wait_time.title: Max Wait Time
max_wait_time.description: The wait time in seconds between choosing new explore points will be chosen on a random interval between this value and the minimum wait time. This value is also the total amount of time the entity will explore random points before the goal stops.

min_dist_from_target.title: Min Dist From Target
min_dist_from_target.description: The entity must be within this distance for it to consider it has successfully reached its target.

min_perimeter.title: Min Perimeter
min_perimeter.description: The minimum perimeter of the village required to run this goal.

min_wait_time.title: Min Wait Time
min_wait_time.description: The wait time in seconds between choosing new explore points will be chosen on a random interval between this value and the maximum wait time.

next_xz.title: Next XZ
next_xz.description: A new explore point will randomly be chosen within this XZ distance of the current target position when navigation has finished and the wait timer has elapsed.

next_y.title: Next Y
next_y.description: A new explore point will randomly be chosen within this Y distance of the current target position when navigation has finished and the wait timer has elapsed.

timer_ratio.title: Timer Ratio
timer_ratio.description: Each new explore point will be chosen on a random interval between the minimum and the maximum wait time, divided by this value. This does not apply to the first explore point chosen when the goal runs.

CJH.title: Find Cover
CJH.description: Allows the mob to seek shade.

cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again
cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time

CJI.description: Allows the mob to look around for another mob to ride atop it.
CJI.title: Find Mount

avoid_water.description: If true, the mob will not go into water blocks when going towards a mount
avoid_water.title: Avoid Water

mount_distance.description: This is the distance the mob needs to be, in blocks, from the desired mount to mount it. If the value is below 0, the mob will use its default attack distance
mount_distance.title: Mount Distance

start_delay.description: Time the mob will wait before starting to move towards the mount
start_delay.title: Start Delay

target_needed.description: If true, the mob will only look for a mount if it has a target
target_needed.title: Target Needed

within_radius.description: Distance in blocks within which the mob will look for a mount
within_radius.title: Within Radius

CJJ.title: Find Underwater Treasure
CJJ.description: Allows the mob to move towards the nearest underwater ruin or shipwreck.

search_range.description: The range that the mob will search for a treasure chest within a ruin or shipwreck to move towards.
search_range.title: Search Range

stop_distance.description: The distance the mob will move before stopping.
stop_distance.title: Stop Distance

DAA.title: Flee Sun
DAA.description: Allows the mob to run away from direct sunlight and seek shade.

DAB.title: Float Wander
